TopicTitle: Have you got your KSP sad story?

Articles.Content: Just had an real bad day..... Ive got a large moonbase in the east crater .I brought up a rover and went on a darkside expedition. Rushed into a steep crater crashed and killed 4 kerbals but i still wanted to go further into the darkness i got my self lost and then i lost connection i tried to rescue my only remnant of the mission but failed ..... now he is stranded on the darkside of the moon lowlands. Hopes and luck for Kony Kerman.....
Relevant for tales of woe:
